internalDatabase.query: SELECT (last_execution) FROM last_execution_of_flows WHERE tenant_id = '{{data.var.tenantId}}' AND flow='{{data.var.flowName}}' AND trigger_type='partial'

settings.stepNote: This is where we specify configurations applicable for this flow

steps.description: This tool is designed to execute the getAllCustomerAttributes operation on the Bigcommerce platform. It requires the JSON payload to strictly match the expected structure (key and type), otherwise, the operation will fail. Always get confirmation from the user before calling the tool.

steps.description: This tool is designed to execute the createCustomerAttribute operation on the Bigcommerce platform. internalDatabase.query:
SELECT record_key, record_data, external_id
FROM "{{data.var.tranzettaTable}}" WHERE last_published_date <= ?::timestamp or last_published_date is null

expressions.name: Customer Email Not Found in BC

internalDatabase.query:
UPDATE "{{data.var.tranzettaTable}}"
SET 
"last_synced_status" = ?,
"last_published_date" = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
"updated_at" = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
WHERE record_key='{{data.var.CustomerEmail}}';

dbQueryParams.value: Record not found in the target platform.

internalDatabase.query:
UPDATE "{{data.var.tranzettaTable}}"
SET 
"external_id" = ?,
"last_synced_status" = ?,
"last_published_date" = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
"updated_at" = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
WHERE record_key=?;
